response.answer_text: the only explanation the Ministry provides is “freak accident.” Triwizard Tournaments that had been held in the past frequently ended in terrible injuries and even death, so their explanation was “we did what we could, but it’s the Triwizard Tournament, so what did you expect?” Unfortunately, we do not hear from Amos Diggory again, which is a pity because I would have quite liked to see him fight the Ministry. What they personally believe happened is anyone’s guess, but it would appear most Ministry officials, including Fudge, managed to convince themselves that something simply went wrong, or they hadn’t been careful enough
the triwizard tournament was known for having casualties. They didn’t know exactly how he died, but they “knew” it was a freak accident
